dcterms:creator: Daniel C Castro

dcterms:description: MorphoMNIST is a dataset designed for quantitative assessment and diagnostics for representation learning, featuring variants that manipulate the morphology of MNIST digits based on causal variables such as thickness, intensity, slant, and width.
dcterms:title: MorphoMNIST

dcterms:creator: Julius Von Kügelgen
Yash Sharma
Luigi Gresele
Wieland Brendel
Bernhard Schölkopf
Michel Besserve
Francesco Locatello
dcterms:description: Causal3DIdent is a dataset used for self-supervised learning that isolates content from style, generated using a fixed causal graph with 10 nodes, containing a large number of training and test samples.
dcterms:title: Causal3DIdent

dcterms:description: SYN-2, SYN-15, and SYN-50 are synthetic datasets generated for experiments in the paper, designed to evaluate the proposed methods under controlled conditions.
dcterms:title: SYN-2, SYN-15, SYN-50
